reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress to be of excellent quality, with one noting it's perfect for late summer and fall. The dress fits well, with one customer mentioning it's right under their ankles, and they appreciate its flattering style, with one noting the ruching covers body faults. Customers describe the dress as comfortable, stretchy, and of great material, with one mentioning it's suitable for mid-late spring.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, stylish, affordable
items.body: Perfect dress for late summer and fall. I am SO picky when it comes to dresses. I need to feel comfortable to enjoy myself. This material is so soft, but light enough where you can actually breath. It fit perfectly too and had room to grow as well. And for the cost this dress is a 100/10 I will wear it again and again Read more
items.author: Mary

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love this dress!
items.body: Very comfortable, stylish, beautiful combination of colors, material feels wonderful and definitely worth the price. I got tons of compliments at a wedding we attended. Read more
items.author: Irina S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning! Buy the dress!
items.body: This dress is stunning, fits tts, very high quality! Read more
items.author: Cheryl L. Goodman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering and great value.
items.body: Loved this dress. I’m 5’4” 174 lbs. and was a flattering fit. Was a tad bit long even with heals though. Other than that, super happy with the dress. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the comfort, fit, length
items.body: I ordered a large and while it is gently loose, it fits nicely at a loose but fitted size, rather than snug-fitted. I love the length. It's comfortable. It has a nice soft lining. Read more
items.author: Michelle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for all body shapes
items.body: Dress looks AMAZING on!!! Great for tall people, im 5'11" and it hit my ankles, great purchase for ANY body shape Read more
items.author: Melanie Williams

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Blue XL, Olive Green XL
items.body: Fits true to size, ordered an XL. For reference I'm 5'6, 215lbs, 44bust, 38waist, 51hips so it was snug in the hip area. Tried out this bodycon style of dress for the first time since losing baby weight after finishing my journey of childbirth and breastfeeding. I actually didn't hate it, I rather enjoyed it. It holds you in and has ruching so it's forgiving and hides imperfections. It will show lumps and bumps from the side profile though so if you're a thicker mom like me and don't have a tight youthful body anymore, you may opt for proper undergarments or shapewear. But honestly who cares, wear the damn dress and flaunt it girl! First 2 photos are the color option "blue," last 3 pics are color option "olive green" (Tried it with a waist chain belt and personally didn't like it on me bc it emphasized my shelf booty so maybe if I get a smaller one that sits higher on my waist it might look better) Read more
items.author: ✨ya motha✨

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Quality = Cost
items.body: Overall you get what you pay for with this one. I ordered it as a backup option for a holiday party and the mesh material was horribly cut and very choppy on the bottom. The dress does not do you any favors but it is very stretchy. I’m sure with the right accessories you could dress it up but I personally returned it. Read more
items.author: Nicole

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve Ruched Formal Bodycon Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve Ruched Formal Bodycon Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Khaki, Leopard Print, Solid-black, Blue, Olive Green, Solid-red, Light Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
